scripts.dev:local: bash -lc 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 20 >/dev/null && npm --prefix "enhertu-profile" run dev'
scripts.build:local: bash -lc 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 20 >/dev/null && npm --prefix "enhertu-profile" run build'
scripts.preview:local: bash -lc 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 20 >/dev/null && npm --prefix "enhertu-profile" run preview'
